data.actual_result: Only displays the first digit (**1** of 15, for example).
data.expected_result: Displays correct amount of mutual servers (when more than 10)
data.short_description: Friends list doesn't display correct amount of mutual servers (when in double digits)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a friend with more than 10 mutual servers - Look at friends tab - look at the "+(how many more servers)".
